explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, with a wooden fence and a cement flower bed in the background, a wooden bench is placed in front of the flower bed. On the left side of the frame, a man in a camouflage jacket and black pants, with a beard, is sitting on the bench. On the right side of the frame, a man in a black hoodie and blue jeans is sitting on the back of the bench with his feet on the seat. A man in a gray jacket, blue jeans, and a baseball cap worn backward is standing in front of them. The man in gray looks at the man in camouflage, holding a mobile phone in his hand.

[0-5] The man in the gray jacket takes a step forward, extends his right hand towards the man in the camouflage jacket, making a smoking gesture, and points to the cigarette case placed on the bench next to the man in camouflage. The man in camouflage turns his head to look at the cigarette case, then looks at the man in gray with a puzzled expression. The man in gray continues to gesture, bending down and reaching for the cigarette case. At the same time, the man sitting on the back of the bench also looks to the right following the man's movement.
